meanings.definition: An individual article or unit, especially one that is part of a list, collection, or set.
meanings.sent1: She picked up each item from the shelf carefully.
meanings.sent2: The grocery list had milk, eggs, and other items on it.
meanings.sent3: The item about the cat wearing a hat made her laugh.
meanings.sent4: His smile was like a rare item in a sea of frowns.
meanings.sent5: The item, a shiny red apple, stood out among the rest.

meanings.definition: A separate piece of news or information.
meanings.sent1: The breaking news item shocked everyone in the room.
meanings.sent2: The newspaper had an interesting item about space exploration.
meanings.sent3: The item that the moon was made of cheese was clearly a joke.
meanings.sent4: Her announcement was an item that spread like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious item in the letter intrigued him greatly.

meanings.sent1: The important item to remember is the meeting time.
meanings.sent2: She focused on every item of the painting to understand its beauty.
meanings.sent3: The item of him wearing mismatched socks was amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes noticed every item of sadness in his expression.
meanings.sent5: The item of the bright red door made the house stand out.
